name: Tengfei Chui
personality: Reserved and disciplined, with a sharp eye for detail and exceptional accuracy
story: Growing up in a small village in rural China, Tengfei Chui learned to hunt with his father from a young age. As he grew older, he joined the military to hone his sharpshooting skills and quickly rose through the ranks. Despite his calm and composed demeanor on the battlefield, Tengfei is plagued by memories of his family and home, which were destroyed in a brutal attack by opposing forces. Determined to avenge their deaths, Tengfei channels his grief and anger into his work as a marksman, taking out enemy targets with deadly precision.
